column4: Which version of ubuntu would be nice on a laptop with 128mb ram, 800mhz Celeron, and an ati rage pro with....xubuntu?
Can you put more RAM in it?
In all reality, look into PuppyLinux or DSL for that machine. Hate to tell ya that.
Mate, have you read any of the specs and requirements for any of the distros? I'd suggest going to www.distrowatch, looking for PuppyLinux or DSL. You've only got 128mb of RAM.
